WorkItem.Description:
There is a bug on Connect that subscribes the problem.
https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=346158#tabs
I´m able to reproduce the problem every time i´m changing an item and confirm the change by using Enter-Key. Only solution I found is to turn of row virtualization. I understand that this is not a primary bug of the Toolkit. It´s a bug in the 3.5 framework. But maybe you could implement the workaround discribed in connect feedback.
